name: Puzzle Snail
description:
This game was made for the "The Completion Jam". its a little Puzzle game where you are a Snail that wants to find her way home. Can you help her?

(The game only has 5 Levels + Tutorial Level)

have fun, if a level is to hard for you, there are possible ways to cheat, but you have to find them.

My youtube: https://bit.ly/38GBbTc

My twitch: https://bit.ly/37VmY5O
